extendedInfo.description: Take JetBlue everywhere you go! Download our app and get instant access to your itineraries, flight status information, mobile boarding passes, our inflight entertainment, snacks and more. * Book travel - Search for and book flights to your favorite destinations. * Check-in - Get your check-in reminder 24 hours before your flight, and check in instantly right from the app. * Mobile Boarding Passes - One less thing to carry on. Easily get your boarding pass for your flight on your smartphone. * TrueBlue - Sign in with your TrueBlue account for a more personalized mobile experience. * Instant updates - Receive real-time flight updates within the app and via push notifications. * Smart home screen - Based on where you are in your travel window, see relevant details about your upcoming flight on the app's home screen. * My trips â View your upcoming trips with ease. * In-flight experience - View and set reminders for the DIRECTVÂ® schedule for your flight, and check out a listing of all our SiriusXM Satellite RadioÂ® channels. Plus, tease your appetite by checking out the tasty snacks and drinks being served onboard. * Connect - Share travel plans with people in your life, and use the Pick Me Up feature to help people picking you up plan their ride to and from the airport. * Guide to fun - Learn about the hotspots at your destination with the City Guide. Plus, create custom postcards, download wallpapers for your phone and more.

reviews.title: I love JetBlue
reviews.comment: I love JetBlue, I like this app. Changed my review... boarding passes are available. 5 stars it is.
reviews.author: Wai Lo

reviews.title: Need update RIGHT NOW
reviews.comment: Was OK until now. My flight is today in 3 hrs (delayed twice, 2 hrs total). Now the app Force Close every time I open it to check my flight status. Restarting my phone didn\'t help either. My flight info saved in the app & now I don\'t know what happens.
reviews.author: Palm N

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: Won\'t even open now, keeps force closing.
reviews.author: Kenneth Beane

reviews.title: Crashes on Galaxy S4
reviews.comment: Tried installing this app 4 different times, and every time I try to use it the app just crashes and will not open again. I have a flight coming up in Dec I\'d like to try this on. Please fix ASAP and will change rating.
reviews.author: Billy Villalta

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: Opened once and then force crashes on initial opening every time since. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Kyle Williams

reviews.title: Used to work
reviews.comment: App no longer works and I\'ve got to fly today, great.
reviews.author: Kurt Bagley

reviews.title: App keeps crashing as of today.
reviews.comment: JetBlue app has been solid until today. App keeps crashing. Have cleared cache, data, uninstalled and reinstalled and rebooted many times but still crashes. Any ideas what\'s wrong? Will rate 5 if this can be fixed but right now it\'s unusable.
reviews.author: Craig Martensen

reviews.title: Crashes all the time on HTC One on Sprint
reviews.comment: App opened up after install and crashed.  Since then, will not open from icon. Rebooting does not fix.  As a work around, it does open from the play store shortcut.
reviews.author: Steve Sullivan

reviews.title: Used to be good
reviews.comment: App was great until latest update. Two different phones Galaxy Note 2 and Galaxy S4... app will not open 9 times out of 10 on either. It used to open  on my Note2.  Now it crashes and wants me to report it; if the app opens, it hangs, then crashes. Not much use if it cannot open.
reviews.author: Michael Buckner

reviews.title: App worked for a day, then hung
reviews.comment: Seemed like a slick app, lots of functionality and smooth graphics, but that only lasted for a day on two different Galaxy S III phones - today (day of the flight)  it hangs soon after startup and requires a timeout for the phone to reboot. Same symptom on both phones. We had to print everything out instead
reviews.author: Wade Boaz

reviews.title: Crashing
reviews.comment: Since last update the app won\'t open on S4
reviews.author: Justin Meyer

reviews.title: Shut down
reviews.comment: Worked great after install. Niw it wont open or update my itinerary.  Flying on a redeye tomorrow morning. Great
reviews.author: Melissa Pescatello

reviews.title: Love the app
reviews.comment: JetBlue has made significant upgrades. I always book my flights  through the app
reviews.author: Margaret Murphy

reviews.title: Crashes on load
reviews.comment: Looks like a useful app, but it crashes on load for me after attempting to log in.  I can clear cache and get back to log in, but continues to crash, then on load after that.  Samsung Galaxy 4.
reviews.author: Jason Hoekstra

reviews.title: App working great
reviews.comment: App was working fine. Stopped working for a few days but its working great now!
reviews.author: Mark Guerra

reviews.title: App not working at all. Completely useless.
reviews.comment: App won\'t even open on my phone. It freezes, shuts down, and says jet blue has stopped every time I try to ope n it. I have exited the app and restarted it and shut down my phone and restarted it and it is still doing the same thing. I have a Samsung s4. I fly jet blue always and am highly disappointed I can\'t use the app.
reviews.author: julie brass

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Nice
reviews.author: Ian Sherwood

reviews.title: No funciona
reviews.comment: S\303\263lo puedes ver los vuelo, pero no te deja reserva, siempre sale un error.
reviews.author: Lillian Guevara

reviews.title: Not compatible w/Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1.
reviews.comment: Need to update compatibility. This is a popular business user tablet.
reviews.author: Steve Cook

reviews.comment: I liked this app till the last update it continues to crash they need to fix this fast.
reviews.author: Yulianna Garcia
